name: Aegis Angel
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
title: Aegis Angel

flavor:
We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons."
—Alabaster creed
name: Alabaster Mage
text: {1}{W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
title: Alabaster Mage

name: Angelic Destiny
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner's hand.
title: Angelic Destiny

flavor: Angels appear before both the blessed and the cursed, though most don't know which they are until they feel either the angel's kiss or her sword.
name: Angel's Mercy
text: You gain 7 life.
title: Angel's Mercy

flavor: There are few things as satisfying as a good, healthy thunk.
name: Arbalest Elite
text: {2}{W}, {T}: Arbalest Elite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Arbalest Elite doesn't untap during your next untap step.
title: Arbalest Elite

flavor: In dark times, Truth bears a blade.
name: Archon of Justice
text:
Flying
When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.
title: Archon of Justice

flavor:
When we of the Northern Verge claim a mount, no peasant's nag will do. It must be as strong as our virtue, and must join us of its own will."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge
name: Armored Warhorse
title: Armored Warhorse

flavor:
Griffins do not serve. They give freely to those they trust."
—Amira, skycaptain of Thune
name: Assault Griffin
text: Flying
title: Assault Griffin

flavor: In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength.
name: Auramancer
text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
title: Auramancer

flavor: One day I will rest and join my comrades in the afterlife, but not while scum like you still sully this world.
name: Benalish Veteran
text: Whenever Benalish Veteran attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
title: Benalish Veteran

flavor:
A world without evil? Boring. Give me vile fiends to smite and banish any day."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge
name: Celestial Purge
text: Exile target black or red permanent.
title: Celestial Purge

name: Day of Judgment
text: Destroy all creatures.
title: Day of Judgment

flavor: Behind every mage is a trail of shattered lies.
name: Demystify
text: Destroy target enchantment.
title: Demystify

flavor: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.
name: Divine Favor
text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
title: Divine Favor

flavor: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.
name: Elite Vanguard
title: Elite Vanguard

name: Gideon Jura
text:
+2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able.
−2: Destroy target tapped creature.
0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
title: Gideon Jura

flavor: The good don't sit and wait for the evil to act. They prepare to defend. They prepare to punish.
name: Gideon's Avenger
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on Gideon's Avenger.
title: Gideon's Avenger

flavor: The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence.
name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
title: Gideon's Lawkeeper

flavor: Your superstitions and mumblings are useless chaff before my righteousness.
name: Grand Abolisher
text: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.
title: Grand Abolisher

flavor: After fighting alongside the griffin riders, older knights of Thune learned to admire a mount that could rip an enemy to shreds in seconds.
name: Griffin Rider
text: As long as you control a Griffin creature, Griffin Rider gets +3/+3 and has flying.
title: Griffin Rider

flavor: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.
name: Griffin Sentinel
text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
title: Griffin Sentinel

flavor: A dozen fighting for each other are worth a thousand fighting for themselves.
name: Guardians' Pledge
text: White creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
title: Guardians' Pledge

flavor: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.
name: Honor of the Pure
text: White creatures you control get +1/+1.
title: Honor of the Pure

flavor: The spoils of war are not measured only in gold and silver.
name: Lifelink
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
title: Lifelink

flavor: Scholars seek to understand the way the world is. I wish to shape the world into what it should be.
name: Mesa Enchantress
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
title: Mesa Enchantress

flavor:
The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard
name: Mighty Leap
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
title: Mighty Leap

name: Oblivion Ring
text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
title: Oblivion Ring

flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.
name: Pacifism
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
title: Pacifism

flavor: A griffin is not just an eagle's wings and a lion's claws. It is also the fiercest of hearts.
name: Peregrine Griffin
text:
Flying
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
title: Peregrine Griffin

flavor:
There is a place deep within my soul where no foe can intrude and no tyrant can conquer."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge
name: Personal Sanctuary
text: During your turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
title: Personal Sanctuary

flavor: Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger.
name: Pride Guardian
text:
Defender
Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.
title: Pride Guardian

flavor: A thin shell lies between the roc and a world of bite-sized treats.
name: Roc Egg
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Roc Egg dies, put a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
title: Roc Egg

flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.
name: Serra Angel
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
title: Serra Angel

flavor:
The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora
name: Siege Mastodon
title: Siege Mastodon

flavor: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.
name: Spirit Mantle
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.
title: Spirit Mantle

name: Stave Off
text: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
title: Stave Off

flavor: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.
name: Stonehorn Dignitary
text: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips his or her next combat phase.
title: Stonehorn Dignitary

flavor: Its hooves touch the earth only when a hero must rise.
name: Stormfront Pegasus
text: Flying
title: Stormfront Pegasus

flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.
name: Sun Titan
text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
title: Sun Titan

flavor: The gods are not always kind, but they do have a soft spot for plucky underdogs.
name: Timely Reinforcements
text: If you have less life than an opponent, you gain 6 life. If you control fewer creatures than an opponent, put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
title: Timely Reinforcements

flavor: The universe is my instrument, and the song I play upon it is one you are forbidden to hear.
name: Æther Adept
text: When Æther Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
title: Æther Adept

flavor: She lures victims with promises of flesh, captures them in a net of deceit, and destroys them in the embrace of the sea.
name: Alluring Siren
text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.
title: Alluring Siren

flavor:
The amphin have long built their society in secret. While surface dwellers squabbled over trivial borders, they patiently expanded, building their ammonite temple-caves. Now amphin priests eye the shore, and amphin hunters gird for war."
—Gor Muldrak, Cryptohistories
name: Amphin Cutthroat
title: Amphin Cutthroat

flavor:
It was too fast, even for our veteran archers. They might as well have been blowing it kisses."
—Vulok, elvish archer
name: Aven Fleetwing
text:
Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
title: Aven Fleetwing

flavor:
We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."
—Azure creed
name: Azure Mage
text: {3}{U}: Draw a card.
title: Azure Mage

name: Belltower Sphinx
text:
Flying

name: Cancel
text: Counter target spell.
title: Cancel

flavor:
Once he's got you, hold on. Fall from a drake and you'll suffer much worse than a bruise."
—Garl, drake trainer
name: Chasm Drake
text:
Flying
Whenever Chasm Drake attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
title: Chasm Drake

flavor: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.
name: Coral Merfolk
title: Coral Merfolk

flavor:
The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle
name: Divination
text: Draw two cards.
title: Divination

text:
Flying
Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.

title: Djinn of Wishes

flavor:
Is cold merely the absence of heat, or a force unto itself? Would a display of its power help you decide?"
—Zubarek, Icewinder Magus
name: Flashfreeze
text: Counter target red or green spell.
title: Flashfreeze

flavor:
Those who claim to know the world in its entirety rarely have the requisite perspective."
—Ulmarus the Wise
name: Flight
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
title: Flight

flavor: If you have to be stuck somewhere for a while, it's better to be stuck there with a friend.
name: Frost Breath
text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
title: Frost Breath

name: Frost Titan
text:
Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.
Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
title: Frost Titan

flavor: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.
name: Harbor Serpent
text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
title: Harbor Serpent

name: Ice Cage
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.
title: Ice Cage

name: Jace, Memory Adept
text:
+1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
−7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.
title: Jace, Memory Adept

flavor: This is a sacred duty. Master Beleren's trust has bought an eternity of my loyalty.
name: Jace's Archivist
text: {U}, {T}: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
title: Jace's Archivist

flavor: You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will.
name: Jace's Erasure
text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
title: Jace's Erasure

flavor: Why fight over scraps of land when there's so much sky waiting to be claimed?
name: Levitation
text: Creatures you control have flying.
title: Levitation

flavor: The dream does not end until I say so.
name: Lord of the Unreal
text: Illusion creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
title: Lord of the Unreal

flavor: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.
name: Mana Leak
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
title: Mana Leak

flavor: Possession is ten-tenths of the law.
name: Master Thief
text: When Master Thief enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Master Thief.
title: Master Thief

flavor: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.
name: Merfolk Looter
text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
title: Merfolk Looter

flavor:
Don't you think if I saw a half-woman, half-fish with three glowing eyes, I'd have remembered?"
—Drugo, town guard
name: Merfolk Mesmerist
text: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
title: Merfolk Mesmerist

flavor:
Every primitive mind has a motive. Easy to find, and eminently exploitable."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
name: Mind Control
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
title: Mind Control

flavor: The creations of the hand are confined by reality. The creations of the mind know no such limits.
name: Mind Unbound
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a lore counter on Mind Unbound, then draw a card for each lore counter on Mind Unbound.
title: Mind Unbound

flavor: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.
name: Negate
text: Counter target noncreature spell.
title: Negate

flavor:
You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all."
—Pol Jamaar, illusionist
name: Phantasmal Bear
text: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
title: Phantasmal Bear

flavor: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

text:
Flying
When Phantasmal Dragon becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

flavor: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
name: Ponder
text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.
title: Ponder

flavor:
It's actually quite simple, but since you've only recently begun to walk upright, it may take some time to explain."
—Jace Beleren, to Garruk Wildspeaker
name: Redirect
text: You may choose new targets for target spell.
title: Redirect

flavor: It's so light and fragile that it can glide where the air is thinnest.
name: Skywinder Drake
text:
Flying
Skywinder Drake can block only creatures with flying.

text:
Flying

title: Sphinx of Uthuun

flavor:
Any oaf can conquer a kingdom. It takes true power to conquer time."
—Shai Fusan, archmage
name: Time Reversal
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. Exile Time Reversal.
title: Time Reversal

flavor: Ribbit.
name: Turn to Frog
text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

flavor:
It's nothing personal. I'd just prefer if you weren't."
—Ashurel, voidmage
name: Unsummon
text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
title: Unsummon

flavor:
The past is the foundation for all that exists in the present. We merely reconstruct what our ancestors have already discovered."
—Sachimir, Sage of Memories
name: Visions of Beyond
text: Draw a card. If a graveyard has twenty or more cards in it, draw three cards instead.
title: Visions of Beyond

flavor: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.
name: Blood Seeker

text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.
title: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth

flavor: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.
name: Bloodrage Vampire
text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
title: Bloodrage Vampire

flavor:
When you find yourself teetering on the edge of oblivion, mine will be the hands taking pleasure in giving you the final push."
—Liliana Vess
name: Brink of Disaster
text:
Enchant creature or land
When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.
title: Brink of Disaster

text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature.
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

flavor: Every grave cradles a recruit.

text:
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.
name: Child of Night
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

flavor:
You clerics brag about your strength of spirit, yet I take away the tiniest fragment, and you crumple like a rag doll."
—Sorin Markov
name: Consume Spirit
text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

flavor:
Let the final vision of doom be etched upon their unblinking eyes."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

Flying

flavor:
Stop complaining. You can rest when you're dead. Oh—sorry."
—Liliana Vess
name: Disentomb
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: Of course I'm sure I've gone mad. The little man who crawled out of my eye was quite clear on this.

Flying

Deathtouch

name: Gravedigger

flavor: Seeing you cower before me is its own reward.
name: Hideous Visage

flavor: Not every thought is a good one.
name: Mind Rot
text: Target player discards two cards.

flavor:
What do vermin cling to when all hope is lost?"
—Sorin Markov
name: Monomania
text: Target player chooses a card in his or her hand and discards the rest.

flavor:
We wield death and darkness, powers that make lesser mages tremble in fear."
—Onyx creed
name: Onyx Mage
text: {1}{B}: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

flavor:
They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
name: Reassembling Skeleton
text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

flavor: An assassin is a king's most trusted courier, ensuring his messages are heard by even the most unwilling recipients.

text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

flavor: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.
name: Rune-Scarred Demon
text:
Flying
When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

flavor: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

text:

−3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10.

flavor: All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak.

flavor: Cherish these last moments. Though your miserable life has come to nothing, I have given it a magnificent end.

Trample

Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

flavor:
How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads, to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams."
—Bram Stoker, Dracula
name: Taste of Blood
text: Taste of Blood deals 1 damage to target player and you gain 1 life.

flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

flavor: Ghouls are often found skulking on the fringes of great battles, showing themselves only to snatch the wounded and weak, dragging their victims screaming into the shadows.
name: Warpath Ghoul

flavor:
Don't blame me. You're the one walking around with skin."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
name: Wring Flesh
text: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.

flavor:
Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
name: Zombie Goliath
title: Zombie Goliath

flavor: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.
name: Zombie Infestation

flavor:
Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol
name: Act of Treason
